attributes.name: infoblox_user
attributes.description: The user name to access the Infoblox server
attributes.label: Infoblox User

attributes.name: infoblox_user_password
attributes.description: The user password to access the Infoblox server
attributes.label: Infoblox User Password

attributes.name: infoblox_ip_address
attributes.description: The IP address of the Infoblox server
attributes.label: Infoblox Server IP Address

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The domain name to associate with the host names on the requested IP address
attributes.label: Domain Name

attributes.name: network
attributes.description: The network defined in Infoblox from which to get an IP address
attributes.label: Network
